metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6938 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the file browser innotebook/notebookapp.py in IPython Notebook before 3.2.2 and JupyterNotebook 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary webscript or HTML via a folder name.  NOTE: this was originally reported as across-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability, but this may beinaccurate.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ipython - 5.5.0-1
ipython3 - 5.5.0-1
python-ipython - 5.5.0-1
python3-ipython - 5.5.0-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ipython package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.0-1').
